humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node only. Lymph node status: Negative 0/4.' This means that all 4 sentinel lymph nodes were negative for metastases, which corresponds to N0 (no positive lymph nodes) according to the AJCC staging system.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node only. Lymph node status: Negative 0/4.' This indicates that all four sentinel lymph nodes were negative for metastases, supporting the N0 stage. The N stage is assigned based on the number of lymph nodes involved and the extent of metastases. In this case, no metastases were found in any of the nodes, so the N0 stage is appropriate.
